mapper.sql: T.ID AS id, T.USER_NAME AS userName, T.PASSWORD AS password, T.PERSON_NAME AS personName, T.EMAIL AS email, T.PHONE AS phone, T.ADDRESS AS address, T.REG_TIME AS regTime, T.STATUS AS statusId, T.CREATE_ID AS createId, T.CREATE_DATE AS createDate, T.UPDATE_ID AS updateId, T.UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GXUser( USER_NAME, PASSWORD, PERSON_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, REG_TIME, STATUS, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_DATE )VALUES( #{userName}, #{password}, #{personName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{statusId}, #{createId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE GXUser SET USER_NAME = #{userName}, PASSWORD = #{password}, PERSON_NAME = #{personName}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADDRESS = #{address}, STATUS = #{statusId}, UPDATE_ID = #{updateId}, REG_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ID = #{id}
